name: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: Chicken, yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, garam masala, lemon juice, mustard oil

name: Paneer Tikka (Tandoori)
ingredients: Paneer cubes, yogurt, turmeric, red chili, chaat masala, bell peppers, onions

name: Butter Chicken
ingredients: Chicken, butter, cream, tomatoes, cashew paste, ginger-garlic, fenugreek leaves, spices

name: Masala Dosa
ingredients: Fermented rice and urad dal batter, mashed spiced potatoes, mustard seeds, curry leaves

name: Biryani (Hyderabadi Mutton)
ingredients: Basmati rice, marinated mutton, saffron, fried onions, mint, yogurt, garam masala

name: Chole Bhature
ingredients: Chickpeas, tomatoes, onions, ginger, spices, bhature (fried bread)

name: Rogan Josh
ingredients: Lamb, yogurt, Kashmiri red chili, fennel seeds, dry ginger, cardamom, cinnamon

name: Palak Paneer
ingredients: Spinach puree, paneer cubes, garlic, green chilies, cream, cumin, garam masala
